is the only snow resort to be reached within one and a half hours from Lucerne, Zurich, Basel and Berne.

Motorway A2 (Basel - Gotthard), take exit Stans-SÃ¼d and follow the all-year open main road 20 km to Engelberg, valley station and parking lots of Titlis Cableways at the village entrance on the right. 1,5 hours from Zurich, Berne and Basel, 30 minutes from Lucerne.

Daily escorted excursions to Mt. Titlis. Departure from Zurich at 10AM and from Lucerne at 11.15AM. Board a modern coach and drive to Engelberg, then continue the journey with 3 different cablecars to Mount Titlis (3'020 m / 10'000 ft).

Booking at the Tourist Office or in your hotel in Zurich or Lucerne or contact Meier Tours, Phone ++41 (0) 1 383 78 78.

Best of Switzerland Tours, Phone ++41 (0) 1 710 50 50. 
Daily escorted excursions to Mt. Titlis. Departure from Zurich at 9.30AM and from Lucerne at 12.10AM.


A must see in swiss

International rail connections to Zurich and Lucerne. From Lucerne with the "Zentralbahn" within one hour to Engelberg. Zurich - Lucerne (45 minutes) half-hourly connections. Lucerne - Engelberg 1 hour by train (leaving every hour from Lucerne and from Engelberg).

Timetable SBB
From Zurich Airport you get to Engelberg within 2 hours by train or within 1,5 hours by car or coach. Further airports close by: Basel and Geneva.
There are restaurants available at the top,but it slightly costlier and crowded sometimes.
